original: Linde, Carl Arvid, postmästare, Göteborg, f. 19/9/80 i Korsberga, Skarab. 1. G. 22 m. Anna Sjöberg. — Lärov:-stud. i Jönköp. E. o. postexp. i västra distr. 99, e. bitr. i Skene 01, v. järn-v:posten i västra distr. 04, postexp. i Kinna 06, i Gbg 10, förste postexp. där 18, förste postassist. 25, postmäst. 29. GMnr.
translated: Linde, Carl Arvid, postmaster, Gothenburg, born on September 19, 1880 in Korsberga, Skaraborg. 1st marriage, married on March 22, 19xx to Anna Sjöberg. Completed his education in Jönköping. Assistant post examiner in the western district in 1899, deputy in Skene in 1901, assistant in charge of ironware posts in the western district in 1904, post examiner in Kinna in 1906, post examiner in Gothenburg in 1910, first post examiner there in 1918, first post assistant in 1925, postmaster in 1929. Guild member number...

workExperience.title: E. o. postexp. i västra distr
